name: Our Journeys 2 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels (Mia Blais-Côté)
name_original: Our Journeys 2 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
A collection of four stories in various genres made with RPG Maker MV.

First Story : Ixelda / Shirina

Two short stories. Each one got two endings.

In “Ixelda, the Cursed Queen”, Denis accidentally free her with her dark fairies. Now Ixelda want to conquer the world. Another take on Denis' quest.

In “Shirina, the Witch”, Lita (full name Manolita) want her best friend Jes (full name Jesabel) to do a magic ritual with her. Said ritual should summon a witch. Another take on Shirina. 

Second Story : Hack the Core

Multiple ending short story.

Chiko is a VR hacker. When a mysterious being give him the mission to stop terrorists, he got work to do! This story was also made in ren'py. This is a Port.

Third Story : Nuri Corruption

Multiple endings short story. Nuri need your help. 

Hir is trapped in the dark version of the hotel ‘Lovers’ Eden’ and the Corruption is always present. This story was also made in ren'py. This is a Port.

Fourth Story : Red or Blue?

Semi-kinetic story. 2k-ish words. Salieka is in love with Taralise since the day she saved her life. 

Two cycles, two destinies, hate or pity. 

Which one will be her's? YOU decide!

Another take on Red and Blue Cycles of Existence.
